column1: Little Goat Diner////I got the "This little piggy went to China" and was blown away with how flavorful it was. Somehow a cheddar biscuit
column5: and an savory Asian sauce complimented each other perfectly. Our party also enjoyed the Bull's eye French toast and the Parathas burrito. We grabbed and donut at the attached bakery/cafe and will definitely be back.
